entities.name: dawlish
entities.description: Dawlish is a person who was stirring. He is mentioned as being present in the scene.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who seized Harry's wrist and closed his fingers over Harry's skin. He has a phoenix named Fawkes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who felt pain in the scar on his forehead when Dumbledore touched him.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is a phoenix that circled the office and swooped low over Harry.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person who yelled 'Where is he?' after Dumbledore and Harry disappeared.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is a person who also leaped to his feet and shouted 'I don't know!' when asked where Dumbledore was.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a person who cried that Dumbledore couldn't have Disapparated inside the school.

relationships.description: Dumbledore touched Harry's wrist and skin, causing pain in Harry's forehead.
Fawkes is a phoenix that Dumbledore possesses.
Dumbledore has possession of Fawkes, the phoenix.
Kingsley opened the door to follow Dumbledore and Harry.
Dawlish also opened the door to follow Dumbledore and Harry.
Kingsley followed Dawlish after they both opened the door.
Fudge is searching for Dumbledore, who has disappeared with Harry.
